name: Only The Wise
description:
In Only The Wise you are put up against bosses that are flowing with strength, but, little do they know you also have immense strength that can rival theirs! The only problem however, is that your body is weak and vulnerable. Dodge and parry to earn your chance to defeat each boss!

This project is a prototype made by a group of 2nd year students studying Bachelor of Software Engineering and Bachelor of Creative Technologies under Media Design School, New Zealand.

This is our fourth prototype done as a group. For each prototype we're only given 1 week to create so bugs, errors and issues are inevitable.

PROTOTYPE THEME/TOPIC
"What good is power when you're too wise to use it?"
- Ursula K. Le Guin, A Wizard of Earthsea

OTHER PROTOTYPES
   ⯈  Dismissal Delivery
   ⯈  Scallywag Showdown
   ⯈  Frame of Mind

CONTROLS
   ⯈  Left Click To Slash Attack
   ⯈  Right Click To Parry Attacks
   ⯈  'W' 'A' 'S' 'D' To Move
   ⯈  'SHIFT' To Dodge/Roll
   ⯈  'ESC' To Pause
   ⯈  'P To Instakill Boss (If It's Too Hard)

TELEGRAPHING BOSS ATTACKS
Each state is given a unique color code consistent across boss fights.
   ⯈  Pink - Parry-able
   ⯈  Red - Attack Is About To Happen
   ⯈  Yellow - Boss Is Stunned/Vulnerable
   ⯈  White - Neutral
